about_the_game:
Purchase this DLC and you can create a wolf with even more character! Cosmetic injuries and oddities based on real-life wolf conditions. Plus ten new wolf coats (five grays and five blacks) inspired by Yellowstone wolves. You can preview them in-game.

NOTE: These customizations are cosmetic and do not affect your wolf's performance, unlike injuries sustained in the game. You can pause your story and add or

Injuries and Oddities


  • Cut Off Tail
  • Short Tail
  • Crooked Tail
  • Missing Eye
  • Corneal Edema
  • Snaggletooth

Ten Wolf Coats


Ten new coats – five gray and five black – inspired by Yellowstone wolves.

  • 925M "Big Gray"
  • 870F
  • 715F
  • 965M "
  • 1091F "Mouse"
  • Little-T
  • 427F "U-Black"
  • 350M
  • 992M "Twin"
  • 1276F "Third Mother"
detailed_description:
Purchase this DLC and you can create a wolf with even more character! Cosmetic injuries and oddities based on real-life wolf conditions. Plus ten new wolf coats (five grays and five blacks) inspired by Yellowstone wolves. You can preview them in-game.

NOTE: These customizations are cosmetic and do not affect your wolf's performance, unlike injuries sustained in the game. You can pause your story and add or

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Radeon 580

name: WolfQuest Anniversary - Building Character Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy WolfQuest Anniversary - Building Character Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 630 Pro or similar (using "Basic" graphics mode)
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or Radeon 580
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

short_description: Purchase this DLC and you can create a wolf with even more character! Cosmetic injuries and oddities based on real-life wolf conditions. Plus ten new wolf coats (five grays and five blacks) inspired by Yellowstone wolves. You can preview them in-game.
